de.zabuza.soundEngine.mixer

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.soundEngine.mixer.Sound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Sound>

    public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Sound>
    Sound class Combines all what is needed for one sound line.
    Author:
    Zabuza
